data.message: Also, can you please change the birthday notifications back to their previous format that allows you to select and send stickers along with your birthday wishes? Just saying happy birthday is rather boring. It was also nice that it showed up automatically in the events tab, now I have to do a search to find birthdays. Not very user friendly anymore.

replies.message: Hi Kim! We appreciate the feedback. Feel free to share more with our team here: http://bit.ly/2wZdQIX. Thanks! -Caitlin
